name: niji3Dstyle
description:
Model overview:


Hello friends,
after midjourney release new niji style expressive, i really fall in love with this style and it make really really good 3D model. So I had make a new model to try mimic as much as i can to the expressive style of niji
This model was trained with about a few thousand images I made with niji

It can generation mostly in the style of niji expressive.
you can use it with pretty much all Lora

For negative prompt:
Deep Negative
EasyNegative
are the best embeddings i suggest everyone should use it with this model

Pls give me some feed back to fine tune this model if you can

meta.prompt: Tiny cute isometric Fox emoji, soft smooth lighting, with soft pastel colors, 3d icon clay render, 120mm lens, 3d blender render, trending on polycount, modular constructivism, Orange background, physically based rendering, centered
